title: Dress Up for Two

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• You need two players for this game (this can include the switch user plus one other person).
• Record each player’s name onto a different switch e.g., one switch says "Mum" and the other says "Dad".
• Hold up a dress‑up item, such as funky sunglasses.
• The switch user then decides who should wear the item by pressing one of the switches. For example, if the switch user presses the switch that says "Mum" then she puts on the funky sunglasses.

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to choose who is going to dress up in what e.g "Mum" wears the glasses "Dad" wears the hat
